feed.title: Lunar Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lunar: v0.8.2
entry.content:
Final Release

This will be the final release on 0.8, which has now reached EOL. We recommend updating to version 1.x as soon as possible.

What's Changed

  • Fix typo in email-notification partial component reference by @repl6669 in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/1740
  • Fix order line observer by @repl6669 in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/1732
  • Fix access to Staff creation panel. Closes #1741 by @madbob in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/1935
  • Apply cart's customer group to discount manager by @se09deluca in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/2083
  • Fix return type on validate scheduling by @alecritson in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/2162
  • Use correct base price in PricingResponse by @se09deluca in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/2080

New Contributors

  • @madbob made their first contribution in https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/pull/1935

Full Changelog: https://github.com/lunarphp/lunar/compare/0.8.1...0.8.2
